titleStmt.title: Æternitati sacrum. Ter̀renum quod habuit, sub hoc pulvere deposuit Henricus Iretonus.
titleStmt.author: Peters, Hugh, 1598-1660.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
With engraved coats of arms and banner bearing the legend "Dulce pro patria mori" at head of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
